text:
### What We Do

* Help you discover remote areas
* Offer the best prices on accommodations and tours (negotiated by you)
* Help locals sharing their business online
* Give money back to the travellers

**Our mission?** Travel more for less by helping locals get online.

### Who We Are

Montreal born traveller and adrenaline seeker, Antoine is always up for some new experiences. He dreamed of extending all of his trip and sharing all unique experiences he lived abroad.

Phys. Ed. Graduated, he travelled in Costa Rica, Croatia, France, Greece, Indonesia, Italy, Philippines, Portugal, Spain, United States and Vietnam and wish to visit every other  country without leaving a stone unterned.
